column1: Slides were washed in PBS - TX and incubated for 1 h at 25 degrees C with appropriate secondary antibodies at a 1: 1000 dilution in PBS - TX with 1 - 3% BSA [ donkey anti - rabbit Alexa 488, chicken anti - rat Alexa 594, and chicken anti - goat Alexa 594 ( Molecular Probes, Eugene, OR)].

Glucose tolerance testing in 4. 5 - mo - old female PGC - 1 alpha - / - mice revealed that, despite increased body weight [ mean +/- standard error of the mean ( SEM) weight of PGC - 1 alpha + / + mice = 22. 4 +/- 0. 79 g; PGC - 1 alpha - / - mice = 25. 2 +/- 1. 04 g), PGC - 1 alpha - / - mice exhibited similar levels of glucose tolerance compared to WT mice on standard rodent chow ( Figure 9).
